Jotunn: So soon!? How do you know, Spire?!

Razorwing: I don't know and I don't care. Perseus, if you wish, I can
send a battalion there to support your soldiers.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Lady spire:
> 
> "Perseus, Perseus, Perseus" sighed Lady Spire"You're so delicious
charming and sweet... But if you don't join this war, the war will go
to Atlantis... or is moving to."said while she cheked something in her
comlink" 'cause, my troops are reporting me that something really big
is happening around Atlaintis and Unicronians signatures are involved.."

>

war.  I'm happy to be involved in the process nevertheless."
